item.title: Park Square 为新的私人信贷工具融资 34 亿欧元
item.description: 欧洲私人信贷专业公司 Park Square Capital 的管理合伙人罗宾-杜马（Robin Doumar）表示，该公司已为一个新的直接借贷工具筹集了 34 亿欧元（38 亿美元）的资金。【原文：European private credit specialist Park Square Capital has raised €3.4 billion ($3.8 billion) for a new direct-lending vehicle, according to its managing partner Robin Doumar.】

item.title: 中国考虑分两步下调房贷利率以保护银行利益
item.description: 中国正在考虑分两步下调多达 5.3 万亿美元抵押贷款的利率，以降低数百万家庭的借贷成本，同时减轻银行系统的利润压力。【原文：China is considering cutting interest rates on as much as $5.3 trillion of mortgages in two steps to lower borrowing costs for millions of families while mitigating the profit squeeze on its banking system.】

item.title: 国际原子能机构称乌克兰的核脆弱性延伸至电网
item.description: 联合国核监察机构正在扩大其在乌克兰的监督范围，将对维护该国大部分发电量的原子工厂的安全至关重要的高压电力网络也纳入监督范围。【原文：The United Nations nuclear watchdog is widening its oversight in Ukraine to include high-voltage power networks critical to maintaining safety at atomic plants that generate the bulk of the country’s electricity.】

item.title: 企业家对工党的资本利得税计划敲响警钟
item.description: 投资者和企业家警告说，如果工党政府在 10 月份的预算中提高资本利得税，英国将失去快速发展的初创企业。【原文：Investors and entrepreneurs have warned Britain will lose fast-growing startups if the Labour government raises capital gains tax in its October budget.】

item.title: 外国投资者一天内抢购 10 亿美元韩国债券
item.description: 据韩国金融监督管理局（Financial Supervisory Service）称，周二流入韩国债券的外资激增，净买入额超过 10 亿美元，为 11 月以来最多。【原文：Foreign inflows into South Korean bonds surged on Tuesday, with net buying topping $1 billion, the most since November, according to the Financial Supervisory Service.】

item.title: 铁矿石逼近 90 美元，中国钢铁需求面临风险
item.description: 铁矿石跌至2022年以来的最低点，因为人们担心中国受困于危机的钢铁行业，这种炼钢材料扩大了抛售范围。【原文：Iron ore sank closer to its lowest since 2022 as the steelmaking material extended a selloff on fears for China’s crisis-wracked steel industry.】

item.title: 乌克兰面临国际货币基金组织要求货币贬值和削减利率的压力
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，乌克兰官员预计国际货币基金组织本周将推动其加快货币贬值、降低利率并加强税收力度，以填补该国的预算缺口。【原文：Ukrainian officials are expecting the International Monetary Fund this week to push it to devalue its currency faster, cut interest rates and strengthen its tax-raising efforts to fill the country’s budget gap, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 据称德国将出售德国商业银行 3%至 5%的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国政府计划出售德国商业银行股份公司 3% 至 5% 的股份，这是德国政府利用近期股价反弹启动退出十多年前拯救的这家银行的第一步。【原文：The German government plans to sell a stake of 3% to 5% in Commerzbank AG in a first step as it seizes on a recent share rally to initiate an exit from the lender it rescued over a decade ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金 BlueCrest 启动外汇交易平台，以开拓蓬勃发展的市场
item.description: 蓝冠资本管理公司（BlueCrest Capital Management）推出了一个名为 BlueX 的新货币交易平台，加入了近年来迅速扩张的市场。【原文：BlueCrest Capital Management has launched a new currency trading platform called BlueX, joining a market that has rapidly expanded in recent years.】

item.title: 日本无印良品所有者良品经济将加入日经 225 指数
item.description: 日本《日经 225 日经平均指数》（Nikkei 225 Stock Average）增加了无印良品（Muji）零售连锁店运营商良品经济株式会社（Ryohin Keikaku Co.【原文：Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average added the Muji retail chain operator Ryohin Keikaku Co. and Nomura Research Institute Ltd., replacing Nippon Paper Industries Co. and DIC Corp.】

item.title: 香港大亨郑氏珠宝聘请路威酩轩集团高管领导全球业务发展
item.description: 中国最大的珠宝零售商周大福珠宝集团有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.）任命了一位来自路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下时尚品牌罗意威（Loewe）的高管，以领导其全球扩张，增强对奢侈品购物者的吸引力。【原文：China’s largest jewelry retailer Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd. has appointed an executive from LVMH’s fashion brand Loewe to lead a global expansion and boost its appeal to luxury shoppers.】

item.title: 全球顶级银行认为中国难以实现 5%的增长目标
item.description: 目前，全球绝大多数银行都预计中国经济今年的增长将低于5%，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）是最新一家下调预期的银行，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A vast majority of global banks now expect China’s economy to grow less than 5% this year, with Bank of America Corp. the latest to slash its forecast and joining the likes of Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 摩根大通成立迪拜私人银行团队，发掘财富潜力
item.description: 摩根大通公司正在迪拜建立一个私人银行团队，与其他许多竞争对手一起向中东增派资源，以利用涌入该地区的数以千计的百万富翁。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co is establishing a private banking team in Dubai, joining a raft of rivals that have deployed additional resources to the Middle East to capitalize on the thousands of millionaires flocking to the region.】

item.title: 中国签署协议改造几十年前的南部非洲铁路
item.description: 中国周三签署了一项协议，将改造一条铁路，帮助非洲第二大铜生产国、内陆国赞比亚通过坦桑尼亚出口金属。【原文：China signed an agreement Wednesday to revamp a railway that will help landlocked Zambia, Africa’s second-largest copper producer, export the metal through Tanzania.】

item.title: 花旗称华尔街 T+1 转换带来的痛苦比想象的更大

item.title: 监督机构称爱尔兰预算计划可能对经济造成压力
item.description: 爱尔兰财政监督机构警告说，爱尔兰政府在即将于10月份公布的预算中违反了自己的支出规定，给经济增加了 "不必要的 "压力，并有可能在以后不得不推翻自己的承诺。【原文：The Irish government is adding “needless” pressure to the economy by breaching its own spending rule in its upcoming budget in October and risks having to reverse promises later on, the state’s fiscal watchdog warned.】

item.title: 日本首相本木加入自民党竞选，誓言战胜通货紧缩
item.description: 执政党自民党的秘书长向日本下一任首相抛出橄榄枝，承诺在成为首相后的六个月内彻底消除通货紧缩。【原文：The secretary-general of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party threw his hat into the ring to become Japan’s next prime minister with a pledge to vanquish deflation once and for all within six months of becoming leader.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：全球经济衰退蔓延，英国股市将暴跌
item.description: 2024年1月3日，星期三，一名上班族走过位于英国伦敦金融城的伦敦证券交易所集团中庭。1984年1月3日推出的富时100指数是20世纪80年代改变伦敦金融城的众多创新之一。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：An office worker walks through the London Stock Exchange Group Plc's atrium in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, Jan. 3, 2024. The FTSE 100, launched on Jan. 3, 1984, was one of many innovations that transformed the City of London in the 1980s. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 就业数据公布前，欧洲股市期货因对美国经济的担忧而下跌
item.description: 由于对美国经济健康状况的担忧，欧洲股市将扩大跌幅，交易商期待本周晚些时候的就业数据能带来新的启示。【原文：European stocks were set to extend losses amid concerns over the health of the US economy, as traders look to jobs data later this week for fresh insight.】

item.title: 中国刚刚度过了最炎热的夏天，但高温威胁并未结束
item.description: 中国刚刚度过了有记录以来最炎热的夏天，玉米、大豆等农作物受损，电网承受压力，但酷暑带来的风险还没有结束。【原文：China just sweltered through its hottest summer on record — damaging crops from corn to soybeans and pressuring the power grid — but the risks from the extreme heat aren’t over yet.】

item.title: 发动机零件短缺可能导致国泰 A350 喷气式客机长期停飞
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，由于备件短缺，国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd.）的空中客车A350飞机可能无法如愿以偿地全部恢复运营。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. may not be able to put all of its Airbus SE A350 aircraft back into service as quickly as hoped due a spare parts shortage, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西波罗内称，欧洲央行政策面临限制性过强的风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）认为，欧洲中央银行不应长期维持过高的利率，因为这可能会损害经济。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t keep interest rates too high for too long as this could damage the economy, according to Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称下次会议可能降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲央行可能会在本月的会议上降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank can lower borrowing costs at this month’s meeting, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 比特币触及一个月低点，黯淡的交易者为非农就业避险
item.description: 由于对经济前景的担忧，全球市场对高风险投资的回撤更为广泛，比特币一度触及一个月低点。【原文：Bitcoin flirted with a one-month low amid a wider retreat from riskier investments in global markets due to fears about the economic outlook.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡大选为何让国际货币基金组织的救助协议成为焦点
item.description: 斯里兰卡的贫困率几乎翻了一番，在经济崩溃两年后，这个岛国将举行选举，选出新总统。9 月 21 日的投票将是对痛苦的紧缩措施的全民公决，这些措施是在国际货币基金组织提供的 30 亿美元救助下实施的。现任总统拉尼尔-维克拉马辛哈（Ranil Wickremesinghe）将与两位希望与国际货币基金组织（IMF）展开新一轮谈判的竞争对手展开激烈角逐。【原文：Two years after an economic meltdown almost doubled the rate of poverty in Sri Lanka, the island nation is holding an election to choose a new president. The Sept. 21 vote is shaping up to be a referendum on painful austerity measures that were imposed under a $3 billion bailout from the International Monetary Fund. The race could be tight, with incumbent Ranil Wickremesinghe facing off against two rivals who want to open fresh talks with the IMF.】
